DOC.brief_summary: This study will assess the potential effects of lesinurad on the pharmacokinetics (PK) of metformin and furosemide in healthy, adult male subjects.
DOC.brief_title: Metformin and Furosemide Drug-Drug Interaction Study
DOC.detailed_description: Leinurad is a weak in vitro inhibitor of the hepatic transporter OCT1 and the renal transporters OAT1 and OAT3 (OAT1/3). To assess the clinical relevance of these in vitro findings, this clinical study will evaluate the effect of lesinurad on the PK of metformin (OCT1 substrate) and furosemide (OAT1/3 substrate).
DOC.criteria: Subject has a body weight ≥ 50 kg (110 lbs) and body mass index ≥ 18 and ≤ 30 kg/m2. Subject is free of any clinically significant disease or medical condition, per the Investigator's judgment. Subject has a history or suspicion of kidney stones, prostatic hyperplasia, or urinary stricture. Subject has undergone major surgery within 3 months prior to Screening. Subject donated blood or experienced significant blood loss (>450 mL) within 12 weeks prior to Screening or gave a plasma donation within 4 weeks prior to Screening. Subject has inadequate venous access or unsuitable veins for repeated venipuncture.
